title: ICAI Announces Online Assessment Test for NBFC Certificate Course
content:
# ICAI Announces Online Assessment Test for NBFC Certificate Course

Ek important update hai. The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne Certificate Course on Non-Banking Financial Companies (NBFCs) ke liye Online Assessment Test announce kiya hai.

Here are the key details:
*   **Notification Date:** December 09, 2025
*   **Assessment Test Date:** The Online Assessment Test for the Certificate Course on NBFCs will be held on December 20, 2025.
*   **Test Timings:** Paper 1 will be conducted from 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM IST.
*   **Platform:** The test will be accessible through ICAI's Digital Learning Hub.
*   **Organized by:** This assessment is organized by the Committee on Financial Markets and Investors' Protection of ICAI.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icai.org/category/notifications)
